snippet: Indian classical dance teams are an emerging trend across U.S. colleges.
abstract: Indian classical dance teams are an emerging trend across U.S. colleges.
lead_paragraph: The women's dance team of the Rutgers University practiced tirelessly for an Indian classical dance competition with seven other colleges, Vijai Singh wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: From India to Rutgers, a Classic Dance Form Perseveres

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
